ERROR_NOT_SPOTIFY: `The user is not listening on Spotify!`
ERROR_OWNER_ONLY: `Only the BOT owner can run this command!`
ERROR_AUTHOR_ONLY: `Only the author can interact with the command!`
ERROR_ADMIN_ONLY: `Only an admin can run this command!`
ERROR_USER_PERM: `You don't have the needed perms to run this command!`
ERROR_CLIENT_PERM: `I don't have the needed perms to run this command!`
ERROR_CANNOT_LOG: `I was unable to send the log!`
ERROR_CANNOT_PROOF: `I was unable to send the proof!`
ERROR_MUTE_DISABLED: `The MUTE command is disable in this server!`
ERROR_MUTE_INVALID: `the MUTE role is invalid. The mute command is now disable in this server!`
ERROR_SELFPROOF: `It's not possible to proof against yourself!`
CONFIG_COMMAND_DEFAULT_DESC:
>>> Use in format `%prefix%config <category> <function>`
Use the buttons to see more details.
CONFIG_COMMAND_CATEGORY_DESCRIPTION:
>>> Use in format `%prefix%config <category> <function>`
Use the button to return.
CONFIG_COMMAND_CATEGORY_FIELD_PREFIX_DEF:
```ini
[ Reset the BOT prefix in this server ]```
CONFIG_COMMAND_CATEGORY_FIELD_PREFIX_SET:
```ini
[ Set a new BOT prefix in this server ]```
CONFIG_COMMAND_CATEGORY_FIELD_MUTE_CREAT:
```ini
[ Create a new mute role, remove "send messages" permissions on channels and set as default in this server ]```
CONFIG_COMMAND_CATEGORY_FIELD_MUTE_SET:
```ini
[ Set a default mute role in this server ]```
CONFIG_COMMAND_CATEGORY_FIELD_MUTE_GET:
```ini
[ The bot will search a role that the name includes "mute" ]```
CONFIG_COMMAND_CATEGORY_FIELD_MUTE_DISAB:
```ini
[ Disable the mute command in this server ]```
CONFIG_COMMAND_CATEGORY_FIELD_LOGS_CREAT:
```ini
[ Create a new server logs and set as default in this server ]```
CONFIG_COMMAND_CATEGORY_FIELD_LOGS_SET:
```ini
[ Set a default log channel in this server ]```
CONFIG_COMMAND_CATEGORY_FIELD_MODLOGS_CR:
```ini
[ Create a new mod logs and set as default in this server ]```
CONFIG_COMMAND_CATEGORY_FIELD_MODLOGS_SE:
```ini
[ Set a default mod log channel in this server ]```
CONFIG_COMMAND_CATEGORY_FIELD_MODLOGS_DI:
```ini
[ Disable mod logs in this server ]```
CONFIG_COMMAND_CATEGORY_FIELD_PROOFS_CRE:
```ini
[ Create a new proofs channel and set as default in this server ]```
CONFIG_COMMAND_CATEGORY_FIELD_PROOFS_SET:
```ini
[ Set a default proof channel in this server ]```
CONFIG_COMMAND_CATEGORY_FIELD_PROOFS_DIS:
```ini
[ Disable the proof command in this server ]```

HELP_COMMAND.EMBED_DESCRIPTION: >>> Here you'll find all commands from this BOT, to see them just select one in the menu below and this page will automaticaly change to the command detail.

RESPONSES_ALREADY_CHANNEL: I already have a confifigured channel, to create a new one prease disable before with `%prefix%config logs disable`
RESPONSES_ALREADY_ROLE: I already have a confifigured role, to create a new one prease disable before with `%prefix%config mute disable`
RESPONSES_NEW_ROLE:
Role created, %role%.
Please now set the role in the correct position and its permissions if needed.
PROOF_COMMAND_IMAGE_ASK: Send a image or press the button to set yourself as `witness`
